shortdesc.ph: Starts an audio recording on the client.

section.p:
The SDK allows recording during a call. After successfully calling this method, you can record the audio of all the users in the channel and get an audio recording file. Supported formats of the recording file are as follows:
.wav: Large file size with high fidelity.
.aac: Small file size with low fidelity.

ul.li: Ensure that the directory you use to save the recording file exists and is writable.
This interface needs to be called later. Once the user leaves the channel, the recording automatically stops.
To ensure the recording effect, when sampleRate is set to 44.1 kHz or 48 kHz, it is recommended to set quality to or.

plentry.pd: The absolute path (including the suffixes of the filename) of the recording file. For example: C:\music\audio.aac.

pd.p:
@param sampleRate Sample rate (kHz) of the recording file. Supported values are as follows:
16000
32000 (default)
44100
48000
